Label.en: The Eiffel tower is very famous, for sure, but it also seems very out of place in Paris...
Label.fr: La tour Eiffel est bien sûr célèbre, mais on peut se demander ce qu'elle fait à Paris...
Label.es: The Eiffel tower is very famous, for sure, but it also seems very out of place in Paris...
Label.zh: The Eiffel tower is very famous, for sure, but it also seems very out of place in Paris...

Label.en: Look at the view of the Paris skyline from the Montmartre hill
Label.fr: Regarde cette vue depuis la butte Montmartre
Label.es: Look at the view of the Paris skyline from the Montmartre hill
Label.zh: Look at the view of the Paris skyline from the Montmartre hill

Label.en: There's a huge metal structure sticking out of the middle of Paris!
Label.fr: On voit une grande structure métallique qui jaillit du paysage
Label.es: There's a huge metal structure sticking out of the middle of Paris!
Label.zh: There's a huge metal structure sticking out of the middle of Paris!

Label.fr: On essaye de comprendre ensemble ce qu'elle fait là ?

Label.en: Through this story we'll discover how much of a marvel it is that the Eiffel Tower exists at all
Label.fr: Au cours de l'histoire on verra à quel point il était improbable qu'une tour Eiffel existe à Paris
Label.es: Through this story we'll discover how much of a marvel it is that the Eiffel Tower exists at all
Label.zh: Through this story we'll discover how much of a marvel it is that the Eiffel Tower exists at all

Label.en: So... I suppose you know why the tower is named 'Eiffel'?
Label.fr: Bon... j'imagine que tu sais d'où vient le nom de la Tour ?
Label.es: So... I suppose you know why the tower is named 'Eiffel'?
Label.zh: So... I suppose you know why the tower is named 'Eiffel'?

Label.en: Right! But actually... both are correct!
Label.fr: Oui ! Mais en fait les deux réponses sont justes !
Label.es: Right! But actually... both are correct!

Label.en: Right! But actually... both are correct!
Label.fr: Oui ! Mais en fait les deux réponses sont justes !
Label.es: Right! But actually... both are correct!
